#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
bool prime[500002];
long long int arr[500001];

int main()
{
    memset(prime,1,sizeof(prime));
    int i,j;
    prime[0]=0,prime[1]=0;
    for(i=2;i<sizeof(prime);i++)
    {
        if(prime[i]==1)
        {
            for(j=i+i;j<sizeof(prime);j=j+i)
            {
                prime[j]=0;
            }
        }
    }
    int t,k,m;
    long long int n,sum=0,large=0;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    arr[0]=-1;
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        sum=0,large=0;
        for(k=1;k<=n;k++)
        {
            scanf("%lld",&arr[k]);
        }
        for(k=2;k<=n;k++)
        {
            if(prime[k]==1)
            {

                for(m=k;m<=n;m=m+k)
                {
                    sum=sum+arr[m];
                }
                if(sum>=large)
                {
                    large=sum;
                    sum=0;
                }
                sum=0;
            }
        }
        cout<<large<<"\n";
    }


}
